type employee = Array<{| firstName: String, lastName: String, age: Number {"typeId": "int"}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"Belete\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"Adane\\\",\\\"age\\\":100},{\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"Abeba\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"Alemu\\\",\\\"age\\\":90},{\\\"firstName\\\":\\\"Tsegye\\\",\\\"lastName\\\":\\\"Tefera\\\",\\\"age\\\":97}]"}
